name: UpdateBroadcastAction
description:
Update the contents of a broadcast action.

Use this tool to update the body of messages or HTTP requests in a broadcast action. It should be called when you need to modify the content associated with a specific broadcast action in Customerio.

parameters.name: broadcast_id
parameters.description: The identifier of a broadcast to update its contents.

parameters.name: lookup_action_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the action to update or modify in the broadcast.

value_schema.description: The action you want to lookup or act on.

parameters.name: broadcast_action_content
parameters.description: JSON object representing the new message content or HTTP request for the broadcast action.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io App API

parameters.name: action_id
parameters.description: The action you want to lookup or act on.

value_schema.description: The action you want to lookup or act on.
